import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-sign-up', templateUrl: './sign-up.component.html', styleUrls: ['./sign-up.component.scss'] }) export class SignUpComponent { constructor(public router: Router) {} public onClickLogin() { this.router.navigateByUrl("/login"); } }
